titles.title: To require approval of an application for compensation for the injuries of Eugene Hasenfus.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on the Judiciary.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Immigration and Claims.

bill.summary: 9/26/1996--Introduced. Deems a named individual to have been a Federal employee in the performance of his duties at the time of his injury for purposes of determining eligibility for worker's compensation. Requires the individual's application to be approved and payments to be made as computed by the Secretary of Labor.
